section.p: The ship is swept far out to sea. Men and goods are washed overboard by huge waves that snap your hawsers like twine. Lose 1 Cargo Unit (if you have any cargo) and reduce your crew quality by one step - i.e. an excellent crew becomes good, a good crew becomes average, and an average crew becomes poor. (A poor crew can’t get any worse!)
At last the storm blows itself out. You are left drifting in unknown waters.
